content.p: Professor of Plant Biotechnology, Chiew Foan Chin is a Professor in Plant Biotechnology at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. Prof Chin is currently the co-director of Research Center of Excellence Future Food Malaysia and Director of Research at the School of Biosciences. She is the Founder and President of Malaysian Agricultural Proteomics Society (2016-2020) and currently a council member of Asia Oceania Agricultural Proteomics Organisation (AOAPO). Prof Chin has been the Chair of several international conferences and workshops including EMBL-EBI MAPS workshop 2015, International Proteomics Conference 2017 and Food Security on Small Island and Developing States 2020 & 2022. She has been in the panel of grant evaluation for FRGS, eScience and Human Life Advancement Foundation. In addition, Prof Chin has been the newsletter editor for AOAPO (2015-2020) and currently an editorial board member for Frontier in Plant Science in Plant Proteomics section. Prof Chin is also a Fellow of Higher Education Academy (FHEA) in UK since 2010. I am the convener for the following teaching modules: Current Issues in Biotechnology; Basic Introduction to Omics Technologies; Advanced Molecular Techniques in Biotechnology; Applied Genetics; Biochemistry My research focuses on plant molecular and developmental biology.
